name: JNF
title: Scenarios Pack
author: JNF
description:
This pack contains the following scenarios :
- "New Hope (4 levels)" : The best learning campaign from Factorio 0.16
- "Hammer of the Gods" : You are a commando ! (by DarkSeahorse635)
- "Lazy Bastard Challenge" : Be fast and efficient to prove your knowledge of the game...
More informations on the mod website.
